Album: Me, My Guitar And The Blues
Lyric:
[by:睡不醒的lullaby]
[00:23]When I first met you 
[00:27]I felt something deep inside 
[00:33]A feeling I've never known 
[00:37]When I looked into your eyes 
[00:43]We danced together 
[00:47]I held you tenderly 
[00:53]And midnight was over 
[00:58]You spread your wings 
[01:03]Lying here with me 
[01:08]You are my dream come true (yes you are) 
[01:13]I won't search no further
[01:17]Now that I found you 

[01:21]Cause you are my heaven 
[01:27]You are my destiny 
[01:31]You are one in a million
[01:36]From heaven you came to me 

[01:43]Lying here with you 
[01:47]Wrapped up in your arms 
[01:53]Two hearts together
[01:57]Beat gently as one
[02:03]We light a candle that burnt eternally
[02:13]My search is over 
[02:17]I found all I need

[02:23]Lying here with me 
[02:28]You are my dream come true (yes you are)
[02:33]I won't search no further
[02:37]Now that I found you

[02:41]Cause you are my heaven                                                                                                                
[02:47]You are my destiny
[02:51]And you are one in a million
[02:56]From heaven you came to me

[03:03]I dreamed about it
[03:07]And how I thought it would be
[03:11]But it's far greater than I imagine
[03:17]the best thing that happened to me

[03:21]Oh you are my heaven
[03:27]You are my destiny
[03:31]And you are one in a million
[03:37]From heaven you came to me

[03:42]You are my heaven
[03:47]You are my destiny
[03:51]And you are one in a million
[03:56]From heaven you came to me

[04:01]Oh you are my heaven
[04:07]You are my destiny
[04:11]You are one in a million
[04:16]From heaven you came to me

[04:32]You are one in a million

[04:41]Yes from heaven you came to me
[04:46]Yes from heaven you came to me
